dialogues.OZUNU:
[1]Wherever you are, wherever you may go.... 
[2]...you must never, ever forget who you are, how you came to be. You are Ozunu. You are a part of me as I am a part of you. 
[3]This is the truth of your lives and it will remain true after death. 
[4]This is my new son. I have given him the name Raizo. Welcome him as your brother. 
[5]You should have died. 
[6]On the street. Abandoned by your parents. Without a home. Without people to care for you. You should have done as most children do, and gone quietly from this world, to the next. But, instead you fought. As you did here today. You fought. And you won. 
[7]Scars are the calligraphy of violence, Raizo. They inscribe the story of one's life. 
[8]You survived because you are different. You are special. That is why you are here. That is why the Great Current, which flows beneath all life, carried you to me. 
[9]Our enemies are everywhere. 
[10]You must move without trace or                       * footprint. 
[11]You must become shadow; Your scent                   * nothing but wind through trees.                      * 
[12]The body must obey the will.                         * 
[13]Hunger and thirst, your bowels and                   * breath, even the blood in your                       * veins, are the body's weaknesses.                    * 
[14]Master them, and you master the self. 
[15]This is the power of the Ozunu clan. 
[16]This is the way of the ninja. 
[17]Eat tonight and you work twice as                    * hard tomorrow. 
[18]The world feeds on the weak. 
[19]Suffering exists only because                       * weakness exists. 
[20]You must hate all weakness. Hate                    * it in others, but most of hate it                   * in yourself. GOLDENROD REVISED 2nd DRAFT   6/4/08   18A. 
[21]Strength is the only virtue that nature respects. 
[22]Hone your body. Sharpen your mind. Become the weapon you will need to survive. 
[23]Did Takeshi's blow hurt you?    You                   * think this is pain? You are                           * mistaken.                                             * 
[24]That is true pain. You must learn                     * to live with it. 
[25]This is your first test. Survive                    * the night. 
[26]Very good, Raizo. Very good. 
[27]These next five years will be the most important of your training. 
[28]A true Shinobi lives in darkness. The night is his weapon.                             * 
[29]You must see with more than your                     * eyes.                                                * 
[30]Weakness compels strength. 
[31]Betrayal begets blood. 
[32]This is the law of the Nine Clans. This is the way of the ninja. 
[33]You may remove the blindfold. 
[34]Your entire life has brought you to this moment. Do not fail yourself. Do not fail your family. 
[35]Keep it. It will remind you that every minute of your life is a gift that I have given you. 
[36]You have made me proud tonight, Raizo. There are some who believed you would fail, but I knew you would not. 
[37]You have a strength inside you Raizo. You must use that strength, now to show me that you are truly Ozunu. 
[38]Weakness compels strength. Betrayal begets blood. 
[39]A daughter that turned her back on her family. She tried to run. Takeshi hunted her down. 
[40]It is the law of the Nine Clans.

[51]You who returned her shall have this honor. 
[52]You are Ozunu. Your life is meaningless compared to the survival of the Clan. This is our deepest truth. Because of it, we have endured for hundreds of years, and will endure for hundreds more. 
[53]Weakness compels strength. Betrayal begets blood. This is the way of the Nine Clans. This is the way of the Ninja. 
[54]I have waited many years for this moment. I have dreamed it, many times. 
[55]You will suffer for seven days, one day for each year you defied me. 
[56]For seven days, we will...take...from you, as I have just done. Everyone here will take from you. Piece by piece. You will live through it all, you will feel through it all. You will watch as the birds fight over the pieces. 
[57]You will know pain like no other human being has ever known. 
[58]Your death will be remembered for a thousand years as a testament to the will and strength of the Ozunu Clan. 
[59]You have not forgotten your training. You will always be mine, child. 
[60]Perhaps this is the best way for you to die. 
[61]Bitch!

dialogues.TATTOO MASTER:
